paragraph.paragraph: The vc_Debugging_Your_Application_home_page 0 Visual Studio .NET Debugger is another area where EiffelEnvision integrates itself seamlessly into, providing the same features and functionality you would expected from any Visual Studio .NET language. The information in this section of the documentation provides all detailed difference between the EiffelEnvision integration into the vc_Debugging_Your_Application_home_page 0 Visual Studio .NET Debugger and any expectations you may have coming from a background in other Visual Studio .NET languages.

overview.xml Debugging in EiffelEnvision Overview
An overview of what to expect when debugging projects create using EiffelEnvision and Visual Studio .NET.

evaluating_expressions.xml Evaluating Expressions with Eiffel for .NET
The documentation on evaluating Eiffel for .NET expressions, using the vc_Debugging_Your_Application_home_page 0 Debugger , at runtime.

not_this.xml Not "this"
The predominant use of this in Visual Studio .NET and how it does not conform with urlEiffel for .NET's Current equivalent.
